patthana24.21:4.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:5.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:5.2: Naaraṇaṃ naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:5.4: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana24.21:6.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:6.2: Naaraṇaṃ nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:6.4: Hetuyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana24.21:7.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:7.2: Naaraṇaṃ nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:7.4: Hetuyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana24.21:8.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:8.2: Naaraṇaṃ nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:9.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:9.2: Naaraṇaṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
